Cloaks:
In our game world, we have four types of cloaks which give a greatly stats to player:
Glorious Cloak - the easiest cloak, can be purchased at the equipment store for an average fee.
Cloak of Darkness - one of the most valuable cloaks you can get it by completing the quest "The Way to Blessing". Only players of the Fire faction can wear.
Cloak of Light - one of the most valuable cloaks you can get it by completing the quest "The Way to Blessing". Only players of the Water faction can wear.
Hero Cloak - the most valuable cloak that only the heroes of the Great Olympiad can get for free.

Belts:
The belts give insignificant increases to the characteristics, but with the increase in level - they will give a huge increase to the amount of HP / CP / MP character.
Belt - 1st level of the belt. You can buy for adena in the equipment store. The main increase is 3% HP / CP / MP.
Rag Belt - 2nd level of the belt. You can buy for adena and resources in the equipment store. The main increase is 5% HP / CP / MP.
Leather Belt - 3rd level of the belt. You can buy for adena and resources in the equipment store. The main increase is 8% HP / CP / MP.
Iron Belt - 4th level of the belt. You can buy for adena and resources in the equipment store. The main increase is 10% HP / CP / MP.
Mithril Belt - 5th level of the belt. You can buy for adena and resources in the equipment store. The main increase is 12% HP / CP / MP.
